DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective study validate Total Psoas Area ( TPA ) measurement independent prognostic factor overall survival patient pancreatic adenocarcinoma . Secondary objective describe evolution TPA follow-up .
DOC.brief_title: Sarcopenia Independent Prognostic Factor Overall Survival Patients With Pancreatic Adenocarcinoma
DOC.criteria: All patient consecutive enrol January 2009 December 2015 underwent least one chemotherapy pancreatic adenocarcinoma , whatever stage A patient record capture outside time frame January 2009 December 2015
